note:
Australian Queer Anarchist
Boosts, faves and questions are more than welcome!
Discord: HaruEb#5555
Any/all pronouns

fields.name: Optimism
fields.value: Sorry if i come off as naiive and idealistic to you, but i cannot give up hope, without hope, we are lost. If that's not your style though, no hard feelings if you mute or block me of course.

fields.name: Nihilism
fields.value: If you disagree with anything I say, I am happy to engage in dialogue as long as we can both stay calm, constructive and respectful.

fields.name: Filtering Policy
fields.value: If either you or I cannot maintain a reasonable composure, I am sorry to say that we may not be the best people for eachother, and please don't take being asked to stop or being muted personally.

fields.name: Be careful, it's dangerous to go alone
fields.value: I take online safety, psychological or otherwise very seriously, please make sure to take care of yourselves and your loved ones.
